remarks: Distributive law for Hilbert space operator difference.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-2000.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjsdi.1 $e |- H e. CH $.
pjsdi.2 $e |- S : ~H --> ~H $.
pjsdi.3 $e |- T : ~H --> ~H $.
pjddii $p |- ( ( projh ` H ) o. ( S -op T ) ) = ( ( ( projh ` H ) o. S ) -op ( ( projh ` H ) o. T ) ) $.
